Last Hero

Description event:
Event held in the Coliseum. The purpose - to kill as many enemies. For each killed enemy give you a reward. The award is not given for killing too weak opponents. You may use any items. Buffs before the fight will not be charged. Given 3 minutes to register, 1 minute on teleportation, 5 minutes for the fight. If the winner is determined before the battle ends automatically. At the end of the opening event, all participants resurrected, heal, and teleport back. In case of death, the experience is not lost.
To register for opening event, you can use the link (Event must be active):
Register in event
Your level should be as specified in the Announce category.
If you do not want to participate, but want to watch the battle - you can use overviews crystals or buy a place in the stands at the Arena Director.
